column.Name: StyleType
column.lookupquery: SELECT StyleTypeID, StyleTypeDescription FROM pStyleType ORDER BY StyleTypeOrder

column.Name: CustomField1
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM iCustom1 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: StyleCategory
column.lookupquery: SELECT StyleCategoryId, StyleCategory FROM pStyleCategory ORDER BY StyleCategory

column.Name: SizeRange
column.lookupquery: SELECT SizeRangeCode FROM pSizeRange Where Active = 1 ORDER BY SizeRangeCode

column.Name: SizeClass
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM pSizeClass Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: IntroSeason
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM pSeason Where Active = 1 ORDER BY Custom

column.Name: IntroYear
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM pYear Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: CustomField13
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM xCustom4 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: CustomField5
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM xCustom2 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: CustomField6
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM xCustom3 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: WashType
column.lookupquery: SELECT CustomKey, Custom FROM xCustom5 Where Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: CustomField8
column.lookupquery: SELECT * FROM xCustom5 WHERE Active = '1' ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: CustomField3
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom as CustomKey, Custom FROM xCustom8 WHERE Active = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: Designer
column.lookupquery: SELECT Firstname +' ' +Lastname as name, Firstname +' ' + Lastname as fullname from users Where TradePartner = 0 AND Title='Designer' order by firstname

column.Name: CustomField12
column.lookupquery: SELECT Firstname +' ' +Lastname as name, Firstname +' ' + Lastname as fullname from users Where TradePartner = 0 AND Title='Sourcing' order by firstname

column.Name: CustomField11
column.lookupquery: SELECT Firstname +' ' +Lastname as name, Firstname +' ' + Lastname as fullname from users Where TradePartner = 0 AND Title='Tech Designer' order by firstname
